DOC.brief_summary: Antiproteinuric Efficacy of Losartan Potassium in Patients with Non-Diabetic Proteinuric Renal Diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Antiproteinuric Efficacy of Losartan Potassium in Patients With Non-Diabetic Proteinuric Renal Diseases (0954-213)
DOC.criteria: Males or females at least 18 years of age with nondiabetic proteinuric renal diseases
